title: Gregory Crouch, “China’s Wings” (Bantam Books, 2012)
description:
When I was a kid I loved the movie “The Flying Tigers.” You know, the one with John Wayne about the intrepid American volunteers sent to China to fight the Japanese before the United States really could fight the Japanese. I recall building a model of one of their P-40...
